text: Kare-ra (makka no tashinkyō to) wa, chijō o tabi shite kare-ra izen no mono no saigo ga ikagadeatta ka o, kansatsu shinai no ka. Kare-ra (mukashi no hito) wa, kare-ra yori mo chikara ni oite sugure,-chi o horiokoshi (te kōsaku shi), mata kare-ra yori mo haete ita. Soshite shito-tachi wa meishō o motte kare-ra no tokoro ni kita. Arrā ga kare-ra o son tta node wanai. Kare-ra ga mizukara jibun o son tta nodearu
